text: Euston Square is a London Underground station at the corner of Euston Road and Gower Street, just north of University College London (not to be confused with nearby Euston tube station). The station, which is within walking distance of Euston railway station, is on the Circle, Hammersmith & City and Metropolitan lines, between Great Portland Street and King's Cross St. Pancras. It is in Zone 1 of the underground. The postcode is NW1 2LU. == References == Category:Circle line stations Category:Hammersmith & City line stations Category:Metropolitan line stations Category:Tube stations in the London Borough of Camden Category:London Travelcard zone 1
title: Euston Square tube station
